comments.creator: jdescottes@mozilla.com
comments.author: jdescottes@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
STRs:
- clean profile
- start firefox
- open https://twitter.com/explore
- start browser toolbox

ER: toolbox should start
AR: toolbox is blank (ultimately shows some timeout info)

Logs read 
```
JavaScript error: resource://devtools/server/startup/worker.js, line 37: NetworkError: WorkerDebuggerGlobalScope.loadSubScript: Failed to load worker script at resource://devtools/shared/worker/loader.js (nsresult = 0x805e0006)
```

Could this be a CSP issue similar to https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1618546 ?
comments.text:
STRs:
- clean profile
- start firefox
- open https://twitter.com/explore
- start browser toolbox

ER: toolbox should start
AR: toolbox is blank (ultimately shows some timeout info)

Logs read 
```
JavaScript error: resource://devtools/server/startup/worker.js, line 37: NetworkError: WorkerDebuggerGlobalScope.loadSubScript: Failed to load worker script at resource://devtools/shared/worker/loader.js (nsresult = 0x805e0006)
```

Could this be a CSP issue similar to https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1618546 ?

comments.author: jdescottes@mozilla.com
comments.text: Disabling CSPs by setting `security.csp.enable` to false fixes the issue. Tracking the regression.
comments.raw_text: Disabling CSPs by setting `security.csp.enable` to false fixes the issue. Tracking the regression.
comments.creator: jdescottes@mozilla.com

comments.author: jdescottes@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text: Tested with a build using the patches from Bug 1618546, they seem to fix the issue. Might be worth adding some CSP tests on DevTools side, but will close as duplicate for now.
comments.text:
Tested with a build using the patches from Bug 1618546, they seem to fix the issue. Might be worth adding some CSP tests on DevTools side, but will close as duplicate for now.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 1618546 ***
comments.creator: jdescottes@mozilla.com
